body_html:
I can't replicate the problem without more detail, but you have 2 potential problems here:

\cuda\cuda_driver.cc:936] failed to allocate 7.20G (7730940928 bytes) from device: CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY

Your attempting to load too much into GPU memory (i.e. either the yolov2.weights or the videofile.mp4. You have freeMemory: 6.63GiB, but are trying to load 7.2G.

could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED

You may want to check that you have a version of cuDNN installed that is compatible with your CUDA version.

\cuda\cuda_driver.cc:936] failed to allocate 7.20G (7730940928 bytes) from device: CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY

Your attempting to load too much into GPU memory (i.e. either the yolov2.weights or the videofile.mp4.  You have freeMemory: 6.63GiB, but are trying to load 7.2G.
could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED

You may want to check that you have a version of cuDNN installed that is compatible with your CUDA version.
body:
I can't replicate the problem without more detail, but you have 2 potential problems here:
```
\cuda\cuda_driver.cc:936] failed to allocate 7.20G (7730940928 bytes) from device: CUDA_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
```
Your attempting to load too much into GPU memory (i.e. either the `yolov2.weights` or the `videofile.mp4`.  You have freeMemory: 6.63GiB, but are trying to load 7.2G.  

```
could not create cudnn handle: CUDNN_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED
```
You may want to check that you have a version of cuDNN installed that is compatible with your CUDA version.
